document_data.caption: The coat-of-arms of the Hunabar family.
document_data.name: Hunabar
document_data.symbol: An orange coat of arms, with a white star and bronze reins.
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hunabar''' ({{Pronounce|HOON|ah|bar|refs=}}) family was a notable part of the [[nobility of Waterdeep]], first gaining nobility status in {{YearlinkName|1170}}.
document_data.Organization: As of the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, prominent members of the house included patriarch [[Haskar Hunabar|Haskar]], consort [[Amonra Hunabar|Amonra]], and Haskar's eldest son and heir [[Haskar Hunabar II]].
document_data.Activities: The Hunabar family were most notable for importing and trading in textiles and fashions.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Hunabar Villa was located in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] on the southeast corner of [[Hassantyr's Street]] and [[Ilzantil Street]], and consisted of two-story buildings.<ref><ref><ref>
document_data.Possessions: As of [[1368 DR]], Horth Hunabar had in his possession a ''[[dagger of homing]]'', a magical dagger specifically crafted as a throwing weapon that would teleport back to its scabbard.<ref>
document_data.Members:
* '''[[Haskar Hunabar]]''': Patriarch and leader of House Hunabar.
* '''[[Amonra Hunabar]]''': Consort of Haskar.
* '''[[Haskar Hunabar II]]''': Heir of House Hunabar and eldest son of Haskar.
* '''[[Horth Hunabar]]''': A member of a group of Waterdhavian nobles who took to delving into [[Undermountain]] via the [[Yawning Portal]].<ref>
*'''[[Elquaern Hunabar]]''': A [[wizard]] that disappeared after fighting the [[green dragon]] [[Galarrdratha]].<ref>{{Cite dragon/241/Wyrms of the North: Hoondarrh|74}}
